resources.string: Player Tournament Coin(PTC) it need to be played tournament. Every day you earn just 15 ptc. when you join any tournament increase you ptc from you current ptc. Tournaments Ptc are not fixed it will be changed by management comity.so don not be hipe if you have any doubt you can send us feedback or email us.
Earning ptc is very simple. you need just watch video Ads (Warning: please show full add). when you show full one ad then you earn 1Ptc coin.
